entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
